text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/condition-category
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/condition-category
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    health-concernHealth ConcernAdditional health concerns from other stakeholders which are outside the provider’s problem list.
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    16100001Death diagnosisDeath diagnosis, or cause of death is a contextual qualifier indicating the problem represented caused the patient's death.
  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    LG41762-2Social Determinants Of Health

name: USCoreConditionCategoryCodes
title: US Core Condition Category Codes
description: The US Core Condition Category Codes support the separate concepts of problems, health concerns, and Social Determinants of Health in Condition.category in order for API consumers to be able to separate them.
